Documentation¶

ipfml.metrics Functions which can be used to extract information from image
ipfml.processing Functions to quickly extract reduced information from image
ipfml.utils Utils functions of ipfml package (array normalization)
ipfml.exceptions Module which contains all customs Exceptions used into ipfml package

ipfml.filters¶

ipfml.filters.noise Noise filters to apply on images

ipfml.iqa¶

ipfml.iqa.fr Full-reference Image Quality Assessment (FR-IQA) methods
